content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-4.5, 23.0)
Consists of boiler (position -4.5, 23.0) and offshore pump (position -7.5, 25.5). The boiler is currently out of fuel and requires water from the offshore pump to operate.

### Pipe network
Consists of the following entities:
- Pipe connecting offshore pump (position -7.5, 25.5) to boiler (position -4.5, 23.0).
- Additional pipes forming a network that connects various entities, including the boiler and offshore pump.

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities you are trying to connect are within a valid distance. The connection attempt from the boiler at position (-4.5, 23.0) to the steam engine at position (-0.5, -9.5) failed due to being too far apart.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to fuel and power
- Check that all entities requiring fuel or power are adequately supplied. The boiler is currently out of fuel and the steam engine is not connected to a power network.
